data.title: Lonely Planet
data.meta_description: Plan your next life-changing travel experience with Lonely Planet’s latest tv stories from around the world.
data.text:
art

Game of Thrones Studio Tour opens in Northern Ireland

Feb 7, 2022 • 1 min read

Game of Thrones fans can continue to experience the Seven Kingdoms as a new HBO-backed Game of Thrones Studio Tour opens in Northern Ireland

history

New research could shed light on the mysteries of Stonehenge

Feb 17, 2021 • 2 min read

Researchers believe that some of the stones may have come from another older monument, Waun Mawn, in Wales.

hotels

This Queen’s Gambit-inspired hotel room features chess pieces on the ceiling

Jan 11, 2021 • 2 min read

A Kentucky hotel has unveiled a Queen's Gambit-inspired hotel room with a chess-piece ceiling where guests can hone their skills.

family travel

Gripped by The Undoing? Now you can rent the beach house

Dec 3, 2020 • 2 min read

The Undoing, starring Nicole Kidman and Hugh Grant as Grace and Jonathan Fraser, was the perfect TV tonic to end the year on.

tv

Gordon Ramsay is seeking young, food-loving travelers for his new series

Sep 21, 2020 • 2 min read

Do you have a passion for food, travel and adventure? Would you like to see the globe alongside one of the world’s most accomplished chefs?

tv

Follow 'The Sopranos' actor Lorraine Bracco as she renovates her €1 home in Sicily

Sep 18, 2020 • 2 min read

Oscar and Emmy-nominated actor Lorraine Bracco is renovating a home on the island of Sicily that she purchased for €1 and sharing her renovating…

tv

Book a stay at The Fresh Prince of Bel Air mansion in LA

Sep 15, 2020 • 2 min read

Fans of the iconic American sitcom may relish the opportunity to stay overnight at the mansion from the show.

music

Eurovision heads to the US with the new American Song Contest

Aug 11, 2020 • 2 min read

The American Song Contest will take place during the holiday season of 2021 and position US states against each other.

tv

A Planet Earth special will team David Attenborough with composer Hans Zimmer and rapper Dave

Aug 5, 2020 • 2 min read

The program will revisit eight of the most extraordinary sequences from Planet Earth II and Blue Planet II.

tv

Zac Efron has a new sustainable travel show coming out on Netflix

Jul 1, 2020 • 2 min read

The Hollywood actor's new travel docuseries, "Down to Earth," explores healthy, sustainable ways to live.

family travel

Stay at a Naruto-themed glamp-site beside a theme park

Jun 10, 2020 • 1 min read

Awaji Island in Japan’s Hyōgo Prefecture is hosting a glamping experience that is sure to excite fans of Naruto and Boruto.

tv

Unlock hundreds of hours of vintage travel on Lonely Planet TV

May 17, 2020 • 1 min read

With the launch of Lonely Planet TV, the world's largest travel content provider releases hours of award-winning travel shows.

film

Get ready Hamilton fans, the movie is being released 15 months early

May 15, 2020 • 2 min read

The story of America's founding father was filmed at Richard Rodgers Theatre on Broadway over three nights in 2016.

tv

Find out where the third season of Killing Eve was filmed

May 9, 2020 • 1 min read

The third season of BBC's Killing Eve has just premiered adding some new backdrops to its already wide list of filming locations

tv

May 1, 2020 • 2 min read

Those tuning in to Hulu and BBC Three's Normal People may be wistfully dreaming of Ireland's rugged west coast beaches and Dublin's cultural delights,…

cocktails

Attend a virtual cocktail hour at the real Downton Abbey

May 1, 2020 • 2 min read

The Earl and Countess of Carnarvon are hosting their second virtual cocktail party at Highclere Castle on Facebook Live.

tv

'The social side of Dublin is something you have to experience' - Normal People's Daisy Edgar-Jones

Apr 30, 2020 • 3 min read

Explore the filming location of the TV adaptation of Sally Rooney's novel 'Normal People.'

tv

David Attenborough will help teach your kids geography at home

Apr 22, 2020 • 2 min read

The renowned broadcaster is part of the BBC's "Bitesize Daily" educational home-schooling series in the UK.

tv

See the USA from above as Smithsonian Channel releases episodes of Aerial America

Apr 1, 2020 • 2 min read

Smithsonian Channel has made nearly 70 episodes of its ground-breaking series Aerial America available for free to view online.

tv

Stuck inside? Feeling anxious? These 'Slow TV' travel videos could be the answer

Mar 25, 2020 • 2 min read

Could watching an eight-hour live-stream of a train journey help you relax and feel less anxious? Norwegians seem to think so.

tv

Connect with friends and family in self-isolation with this 'Netflix Party' feature

Mar 18, 2020 • 2 min read

Netflix is making it easier for friends to connect no matter where they are self-isolating in the world with the launch of its new 'party' feature.
